name: Vyletongue Corruption
tooltip:
Vyletongue CorruptionLevel 47

Fill the Coated Cerulean Vial at the orange crystal pool in Maraudon.

Use the Filled Cerulean Vial on the Vylestem Vines to force the corrupted Noxxious Scion to emerge.

Heal 8 plants by killing these Noxxious Scion, then return to Vark Battlescar in Shadowprey Village.

Requirements:
- Vylestem Vines healed x 8
- Filled Cerulean Vial
